Title: CAD Drawings For Fast Food Chain
Location: England
Job Description
We require a CAD designer to provide CAD plans for new branches of a fast food restaurant chain.
The chain will be opening between 20 and 30 new locations this year so we require someone who will be able to produce plans for each location.
The chain already has established restaurant fit outs and so the plans will be very straightforward for anyone who knows what they are doing. It has basically a template fit out based on the original designs.
I have attached drawings from one of the restaurants as a guide for what is required.
Your bid should include the following:
- Site visit to measure up and discuss layout with client. - Full internal CAD plans (floorplan and 2 internal elevations) showing partitions, electrical layouts, lighting, furniture, kitchen appliances, staff/customer toilets. - Exterior CAD elevation showing signage (essential for planning permission and advertising consent).
Please provide an all inclusive cost for the above including 2 sets of changes to agree the final layout.
If you are able to provide before/after visuals for exterior signage, please also quote for that as an additional cost.
Lastly, if you could also provide a cost for a smaller unit that would be very helpful.
Budget is extremely tight for this project, but it is repeat business and will provide good, regular work.
I look forward to hearing from you!
Job Budget
Type: Fixed Price
Budget: £500 - £2,000 (Approx €634 - €2,536) Additional Information
Attached Files: examples_pph.pdf
